animals.name: Friendly Cat
animals.description: A friendly cat that seems curious about travelers.
animals.interaction_message: The cat purrs contentedly and follows you for a short distance.

animals.name: Loyal Dog
animals.description: A loyal dog that wags its tail at approaching adventurers.
animals.interaction_message: The friendly dog wags its tail and seems eager to play.

animals.name: Graceful Deer
animals.description: A graceful deer grazing peacefully in the wilderness.
animals.interaction_message: The deer looks up briefly, then returns to grazing, unafraid.

animals.name: Wild Chicken
animals.description: A wild chicken pecking at the ground for seeds.
animals.interaction_message: The chicken clucks and scurries away, leaving behind a fresh egg.

animals.name: Wild Pig
animals.description: A stout pig rooting through the undergrowth.
animals.interaction_message: The pig snorts and continues rooting around, unbothered by your presence.

animals.name: Woolly Sheep
animals.interaction_message: The sheep bleats softly and continues grazing peacefully.

animals.name: Swamp Lizard
animals.description: A large lizard basking in the sun.
animals.interaction_message: The lizard flicks its tongue and watches you warily before scurrying away.

animals.name: Cave Bat
animals.description: A bat hanging from a nearby branch or cave entrance.
animals.interaction_message: The bat squeaks and flutters its wings, disturbed by your approach.

animals.name: Majestic Unicorn
animals.description: A rare and majestic unicorn, its horn gleaming in the light.
animals.interaction_message: The majestic unicorn allows you to approach, a rare honor indeed.
